data.title: Mechanicsville
data.meta_description: Alpine is a brand that we've been happy to carry for quite a few years. We are proud to be an Alpine Flagship Retail Specialist serving the Richmond market!
data.text:
Alpine is a brand that we’ve been happy to carry for quite a few years now. We are proud to be an Alpine Flagship Retail Specialist serving the entire Richmond, Virginia market! Our Flagship status is earned based on our store’s overall professionalism and expertise in system design and installation. Since Alpine knows we are the experts and their products will be installed correctly and in the right applications, they upgrade any products purchased from us to have a 2 year warranty instead of the one year you would get at a “standard” Alpine dealer! That includes Alpine cd players, amplifiers, speakers, subwoofers, backup camera’s, and navigation systems.

Here is some additional information about Alpine’s product line:

Alpine Head Units

For over 35 years, Alpine has set the standard for in-dash head unit solutions. Times have changed, but Alpine has always been looked at as the best choice for source units in your vehicle. With cutting edge technologies like TuneIt, Pandora, Pandora, Satellite Radio, and Bluetooth, you are sure to always have the quality and features that you desire.

Alpine Navigation

Alpine sets the bar with in-dash navigation systems. With lightning fast response and up to the date mapping you will always be pointed in the right direction. Add to that many of the same features that are found in their head units and you have a state of the art in-dash solution worthy of today’s advanced vehicles.

Alpine Car Audio Amplifiers

Alpine has always backed up their legendary head unit line up with rock solid amplifier performance. Regardless of the need or circumstance, Alpine has an amplifier solution:

V-Power Amplifiers – Tens of thousands have relied on V-Power amplifiers for dependable, quality power. Now in their fourth generation, V-Power amplifiers carry on this heritage and prove that playing strong never looked our sounded better. Yes, it is possible to improve upon a good thing.

PDR Amplifiers – Welcome the new digital PDR-Power series of Class-D amplifiers. The PDR-Power amplifiers incorporate many of Alpine’s best in class digital technologies, high performance and signature sound.

PDX Amplifiers – Good things come in small, stackable packages. Who knew something so small could pump so much power? The Alpine marine PDX series amplifiers are for the true audio enthusiast – for those who want the best power, sound quality, and efficiency, all from a compact size. Get the most out of your system with Digital PDX.

Alpine Car and Marine Audio Speakers

One of the best (or worst) kept secrets from Alpine is their incredible speaker lineup. Alpine has a solution for every budget and every listener including a world class line of Marine grade speakers:

Type R Speakers – A lot of speakers can sound loud. But very few speakers can handle an enormous amount of power and reproduce that sound with extreme clarity like the new and improved Type-R speakers. You get all the power handling without sacrificing clarity. Type-R speakers deliver solid performance, superior linearity, efficiency, and great bass response. Upgrade to Type-R speakers and hear the perfect balance of power and control.

Type S Speakers – Introducing the Type-S speaker line up with multiple size options that fit almost any vehicle. If you want to add incredible sounding Alpine speakers to your system, this is the way to go. This latest offering from the popular Type-S family of speakers is a best bet upgrade, and still budget-friendly.

Type E Speakers – Step up your factory speakers to an affordable upgrade with the all new Alpine Type-E speakers, for performance packed sound quality you expect from Alpine.

Alpine Marine Audio Speakers – Before you embark on your sea or river expedition, add an Alpine audio system to your boat!

Alpine Subwoofers

No car or marine audio system is complete without the solid, bottom end provided by subwoofers. Alpine completes their award winning product mix with subwoofers that meet the same standards:

Type X Subwoofers – If you are looking for a high-quality subwoofer with the most accurate and precise in-vehicle subwoofer performance, then look no further. Alpine’s 2nd generation state-of-the-art Type-X Subwoofers are your answer. With the advanced motor structure and new sound of these subs, you will experience higher efficiency, lower heat creation while maintaining superb sound, so you can really crank up the bass.

Type R Subwoofers – These redesigned fifth-generation Type-R subwoofers include an abundance of enhanced features to achieve staggering power handing capabilities, cleaner output, deeper bass extension and ultra-responsive control than ever before.

Type S Subwoofers – The new fourth-generation Type-S subwoofers have undergone a revolutionary redesign, leaning heavily on patented technologies developed for the Type-R series. The result is a subwoofer that is so good we had to redesign the Type-R. These new subwoofers redefine the expectations in their class. Altogether, they offer significantly improved output, deeper bass extension, more control and even greater power handling.

SWA Subwoofers – BASSLINE™ subwoofers were born from the collaboration between Alpine and Far East Movement, sharing one thing that is true to our hearts – music you can feel. Building on Alpine’s long heritage in subwoofer engineering, we assigned our best and brightest engineers to work with Far East Movement to create a subwoofer line that could spread our passion for deep, hard-hitting bass while being budget-friendly for anyone to enjoy. These subwoofers will keep your wallet light, your bass heavy and will let your music Play Strong.

Marine Audio Subwoofers – No sound system is complete without the perfect sub for complimentary bass. Don’t deprive your boat from the absolute best sound you can get. Alpine presents the SWR-M100, a 10-inch marine subwoofer part of the all-new marine lineup. The SWR-M100’s high excursion capabilities mean deep, high-output bass for great on-water performance, no matter where it is installed!

Company Profile

Alpine Electronics of America, Inc., is the industry-leading manufacturer of high performance mobile electronics, founded in 1978. Alpine is the only manufacturer specializing in mobile multimedia, an integrated system approach incorporating digital entertainment, security and navigation products for your mobile entertainment. As a consolidated subsidiary of Alps Electric Co., Ltd., one of the world’s premier manufacturers of electronic components for computer, communications and car electronic equipment, Alpine is the specialized supplier of quality mobile electronics systems.

Alpine strives to answer the demands of consumers and automakers for high-quality, competitively priced products. The company utilizes leading edge, digital technology in pursuit of excellence in sound reproduction. With the vision of combining music, visual images and information, Alpine’s Mobile Multimedia systems exceed concept expectations for a new kind of driving experience for the next century.

Extreme Audio is Richmond’s Alpine Headquarters

Extreme Audio is Richmond, Virginia’s Authorized Alpine Dealer! We stock a wide selection and they know how to install all of it the right way the first time. As an added bonus, you can rest assured that you are making your purchase from 1 of the very best shops in all of North America: Extreme Audio was named the 2013 Mobile Electronics Retailer of the Year.

So there you have it. Alpine’s 35 year commitment to excellence and Extreme Audio’s dedication to be the best of their kind…. ANYWHERE. That sounds like a shop you would want working on your vehicle or boat, doesn’t it?
